description: Infection information from abstractions with clinical information reported to CROWNWeb, the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INFECTION_REQ_HOSP_YN
columns.description:
Shows whether a dialysis patient's infections required hospitalization.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: INFECTION_REQ_HOSP_NA_YN
columns.description:
Shows whether a dialysis patient's infection hospitalization information is available.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: INFECTION_REQ_HOSP_YN

columns.name: INFECTION_HOSP_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's infection hospitalization date.
